name: Tenjin
headline: Mobile marketing analytics and infrastructure
description:
We're a mobile attribution and analytics provider, focused on helping app developers, marketers, and publishers find and grow their users. We track a bunch of metrics such as ad spend, ad revenue, in-app purchase revenue, subscription revenue, retention, etc. We also have a data warehousing product that lets our customers directly query the data we've collected.

Experts at mobile advertising, need help with handling all of this data and making a very technical front-end more user-friendly.

#### The latest ‚ÄúAd Monetization in Mobile Games ‚Äì Benchmark Report 2024‚Äù is here!
This report includes market share data for ad monetization channels and countries, based on a sample from Tenjin, as well as the average eCPM benchmark with a breakdown per country and format, based on data from CAS.AI.
[ Get The Report ](https://www.tenjin.com/<https:/hubs.ly/Q02z3D5y0>)
## Mobile Marketing Analytics that Save Your Advertising Budget
Unlock the power of mobile attribution & app analytics with our end-to-end measurement capabilities.
###### Mobile Attribution
#### The ultimate growth engine for mobile apps
Seamlessly identify and double down on the best users and advertising channels for your app with Tenjin‚Äôs mobile attribution.
[ Read More ](https://www.tenjin.com/</mobile-attribution/>)
![](https://tenjin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/grid-box-img-3-768x461.png)
###### ROI Dashboard
#### Maximize ROI with a unified view of ad spend and revenue
Tenjin‚Äôs user-friendly dashboard enables you to identify the channels and users that are bringing you the highest ROI at a glance.
[ Read More ](https://www.tenjin.com/</roi-dashboard/>)
![](https://tenjin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/grid-box-img-4-768x461.png)
###### Ad Monetization Suite
#### All the tools you need for hybrid monetization at your fingertips 
Tenjin‚Äôs Ad Monetization Suite provides an unparalleled set of tools for mobile publishers that choose to monetize via showing ads in their apps.
[ Read More ](https://www.tenjin.com/</ad-monetization-suite/>)
![](https://tenjin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Ad-monetization-suite-768x461.png)
###### Marketing Data Warehouse
#### Unlock an unlimited number of use cases with DataVault
DataVault provides quick, reliable, and cost-effective access to marketing data that is usually only available for enterprise level companies.
[ Read More ](https://www.tenjin.com/</marketing-data-warehouse/>)

### Used by the world‚Äôs most innovative teams
![](https://tenjin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/kooapps-1.svg) ![](https://tenjin.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/hyperbeard_color-1.svg) ![](https://tenjin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/yomi.svg) ![](https://tenjin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/tokyo-tsushin.svg)
slide 1 of 4
#### Kooapps' journey from from indie studio to major publisher with Tenjin
In this case study, we take you through the journey of Kooapps as they scale from an indie studio to a major publisher with Tenjin. Here is a summary of the results they achieved using Tenjin‚Äôs ad attribution, session-based ad revenue LTV, and DataVault:
  * **8x** Revenue Growth
  * **3x** LTV increase


_![](https://tenjin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/kooapps.png) _ **Chun-Kai Wang** _Co-founder & CEO at Kooapps_
Revenue is up 8x since we first used Tenjin a few years ago and paid UA spend is 30x so Tenjin has completely transformed our business. We love Tenjin!
[ Read More ](https://www.tenjin.com/</blog/how-to-scale-your-indie-studio-to-a-major-publisher-a-kooapps-case-study/>)
#### How Mexico‚Äôs Top Mobile Publisher Boosted their Portfolio LTV by 35% ‚Äì A HyperBeard Case Study
HyperBeard is the largest mobile game developer and publisher in Mexico, with 210 Million+ downloads on AppStore and PlayStore. They specialize in cute casual idle games targeting a young, adult, female demographic.
  * **20%** increase in ROAS
  * **35%** Portfolio LTV (cross-promo) uplift


_![](https://tenjin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/hyperbeard-1.png) _ **Alex Kozachenko** _Co-founder & CEO at HyperBeard_
We love using DataVault. Historically, we were just using whatever was available on the dashboard with whatever MMP we were using. But obviously, that‚Äôs pretty limited. DataVault allows us to expand beyond the Tenjin dashboard. It‚Äôs great for creative performance tracking, and Portfolio LTV analysis.
[ Read More ](https://www.tenjin.com/</blog/how-mexicos-top-mobile-publisher-boosted-their-portfolio-ltv-by-35-a-hyperbeard-case-study/>)
#### Ad Revenue Callbacks and ROAS campaigns increased YOMI Studio‚Äôs ARPDAU by 60% ‚Äì Case Study
In this case study, we take you through the journey of YOMI Studio as they enter an unprecedented phase of hyper-growth after incorporating Tenjin‚Äôs Ad Revenue Callbacks and ROAS Campaigns. Here is a summary of what they achieved:
  * **60** hours per month of co-founder‚Äôs time saved
  * **60%** ARPDAU uplift


_![](https://tenjin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/avatar-1.png) _ **Light Nguyen** _Co-founder at YOMI studio_
Combining Tenjin Ad Revenue Callbacks and ROAS campaigns has enabled us to spend less time on optimization but still scale campaigns at will, moving YOMI into an unprecedented phase of hyper-growth.
[ Read More ](https://www.tenjin.com/</blog/how-yomi-studio-unlocked-hyper-growth-with-tenjins-ad-revenue-callbacks/>)
#### How to increase ROAS and LTV for SKAN campaigns with TikTok & Tenjin ‚Äì A Tokyo Tsushin Case Study
Tokyo Tsushin partnered with TikTok and Tenjin to easily identify users who would trigger valuable in-app events such as purchase, subscribe, and level completion, while controlling costs.
  * **33%** increase in Day 7 ROAS
  * **24%** increase in Day 3 LTV


_![](https://tenjin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/avatar-1-1.png) _ **Kasuga Yachi** _Marketing Section Manager at Tokyo Tsushin_
Launching scalable SKAN campaigns is definitely a challenge. Thanks to the combination of TikTok and Tenjin, we were able to run goal-oriented SKAN campaigns at scale.
[ Read More ](https://www.tenjin.com/</blog/how-to-increase-roas-and-ltv-for-skan-campaigns-with-tiktok-tenjin/>)

### Used by the world‚Äôs most innovative teams
![](https://tenjin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/kooapps-1.svg) ![](https://tenjin.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/04/hyperbeard_color-1.svg) ![](https://tenjin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/yomi.svg) ![](https://tenjin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/tokyo-tsushin.svg)

#### Kooapps' journey from from indie studio to major publisher with Tenjin
In this case study, we take you through the journey of Kooapps as they scale from an indie studio to a major publisher with Tenjin. Here is a summary of the results they achieved using Tenjin‚Äôs ad attribution, session-based ad revenue LTV, and DataVault:
  * **8x** Revenue Growth
  * **3x** LTV increase


_![](https://tenjin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/kooapps.png) _ **Chun-Kai Wang** _Co-founder & CEO at Kooapps_
Revenue is up 8x since we first used Tenjin a few years ago and paid UA spend is 30x so Tenjin has completely transformed our business. We love Tenjin!
 Read More ‚ü®54‚ü©
#### How Mexico‚Äôs Top Mobile Publisher Boosted their Portfolio LTV by 35% ‚Äì A HyperBeard Case Study
HyperBeard is the largest mobile game developer and publisher in Mexico, with 210 Million+ downloads on AppStore and PlayStore. They specialize in cute casual idle games targeting a young, adult, female demographic.
  * **20%** increase in ROAS
  * **35%** Portfolio LTV (cross-promo) uplift


_![](https://tenjin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/hyperbeard-1.png) _ **Alex Kozachenko** _Co-founder & CEO at HyperBeard_
We love using DataVault. Historically, we were just using whatever was available on the dashboard with whatever MMP we were using. But obviously, that‚Äôs pretty limited. DataVault allows us to expand beyond the Tenjin dashboard. It‚Äôs great for creative performance tracking, and Portfolio LTV analysis.
 Read More ‚ü®55‚ü©
#### Ad Revenue Callbacks and ROAS campaigns increased YOMI Studio‚Äôs ARPDAU by 60% ‚Äì Case Study
In this case study, we take you through the journey of YOMI Studio as they enter an unprecedented phase of hyper-growth after incorporating Tenjin‚Äôs Ad Revenue Callbacks and ROAS Campaigns. Here is a summary of what they achieved:
  * **60** hours per month of co-founder‚Äôs time saved
  * **60%** ARPDAU uplift


_![](https://tenjin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/avatar-1.png) _ **Light Nguyen** _Co-founder at YOMI studio_
Combining Tenjin Ad Revenue Callbacks and ROAS campaigns has enabled us to spend less time on optimization but still scale campaigns at will, moving YOMI into an unprecedented phase of hyper-growth.
 Read More ‚ü®56‚ü©
#### How to increase ROAS and LTV for SKAN campaigns with TikTok & Tenjin ‚Äì A Tokyo Tsushin Case Study
Tokyo Tsushin partnered with TikTok and Tenjin to easily identify users who would trigger valuable in-app events such as purchase, subscribe, and level completion, while controlling costs.
  * **33%** increase in Day 7 ROAS
  * **24%** increase in Day 3 LTV


_![](https://tenjin.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/avatar-1-1.png) _ **Kasuga Yachi** _Marketing Section Manager at Tokyo Tsushin_
Launching scalable SKAN campaigns is definitely a challenge. Thanks to the combination of TikTok and Tenjin, we were able to run goal-oriented SKAN campaigns at scale.
 Read More ‚ü®57‚ü©

generated_description:
**Tenjin: Mobile Marketing Analytics Made Simple**

Founded in 2014 as part of Y Combinator's Summer 2014 batch, Tenjin stands at the intersection of mobile marketing analytics and app development. Headquartered in San Francisco, this lean team of 30 is on a mission to demystify mobile attribution and analytics for app developers, marketers, and publishers. They‚Äôre not just tracking user engagement; they‚Äôre providing a complete analytics solution that helps businesses understand and optimize their mobile marketing efforts.

### What They Do
Tenjin specializes in mobile attribution‚Äîhelping businesses identify their best users and most effective marketing channels. The platform tracks a myriad of metrics, including ad spend, ad revenue, in-app purchases, subscription revenue, and user retention. One standout feature is their data warehousing product, enabling clients to directly query collected data, making complex insights accessible and actionable.

The company advocates for a user-friendly interface amidst the highly technical landscape of mobile advertising, ensuring that service is both powerful and straightforward.

### Core Products and Services
Their offerings revolve around key pillars:

- **Measure:** Tools for mobile attribution and cost-revenue aggregation, crucial for understanding ad effectiveness.
  
- **Analyze:** A comprehensive ROI dashboard that unifies cost and revenue reporting, alongside predictive analytics for customer lifetime value (LTV).
  
- **Protect:** Fraud prevention measures that ensure marketing budgets are focused on genuine users.
  
- **Automate:** Solutions to streamline operations, including automation of mundane tasks and data pipelines that enhance data management.

### Success Stories and Impact
Tenjin attracts impressive clients who have seen remarkable growth through their platform. For instance, Kooapps, an indie studio, achieved an **8x revenue growth** by leveraging Tenjin‚Äôs attribution tools, while YOMI Studio measured a **60% uplift in ARPDAU** using their services. HyperBeard highlighted a **35% improvement in portfolio LTV**, showcasing Tenjin's impact on cross-promotion strategies.

### Resources and Community
Tenjin offers a wealth of resources, including a blog full of best practices, case studies, and benchmarks that keep clients informed about trends and insights in mobile marketing. Their commitment to education in the space is evident and invaluable for app developers navigating complex analytics landscapes.

For those interested in diving deeper, Tenjin provides demo opportunities and ongoing support to ensure their clients can fully leverage the analytics tools at their disposal.

### Conclusion
In a fast-evolving sector like mobile marketing, Tenjin presents itself as an essential partner for any app developer looking to enhance user acquisition and retention. Their focus on making data accessible and actionable, coupled with strong customer backing, positions them as a go-to resource in mobile marketing analytics. If you're ready to unlock the full potential of your app and save your advertising budget, Tenjin might just be the key you've been looking for.

For more information, visit their site at [tenjin.com](https://www.tenjin.com).
